scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const template = fs.readFileSync('wrangler.toml.template', 'utf8'); const projectName = path.basename(process.cwd()); const config = template.replace('{{ project_id }}', projectName); fs.writeFileSync('wrangler.toml', config); fs.unlinkSync('wrangler.toml.template');"
